title: American Cinematographer - January 2014 (gnv64)
description:
American Cinematographer - January 2014
English | 100 Pages | True PDF | 27.1 mb

On Our Cover: Folk singer Llewyn Davis (Oscar Isaac) falls on hard times as he struggles to crack the Greenwich Village music scene in Inside Llewyn Davis, shot by Bruno Delbonnel, ASC, AFC. (Photo by Alison Rosa, courtesy of CBS Films.)

64 A Curious Camera

The Invisible Woman

love story Her
